item.title: Statistics
item.description:
A short description of the page which would serve as blurb in a RSS feed; you can use basic markdown here but the whole description string must be a single line (not a multiline string). Like this one for instance. Keep in mind that styling is minimal in RSS so for instance don't expect maths or fancy styling to work; images should be ok though:

item.title: Intro to Python
item.description:
Python is one of the many languages used in the data science community to perform data manipulation, statistical modeling and machine learning. There are certain tasks where Python excels and you may choose to use it over Julia. This section will provide you with the basic syntax of Python to get started.
Read more
